thread.title: BMW unveils a flying motorbike concept based on Lego
thread.title_full: BMW unveils a flying motorbike concept based on Lego

title: BMW unveils a flying motorbike concept based on Lego
text: show ad Would you ride a FLYING motorbike? BMW unveils a futuristic concept hover vehicle based on Lego In January, Lego unveiled a 603 piece kit to create a model of the BMW R 1200 GS Adventure bike The designers then went on to use the same pieces to make a flying motorbike model BMW engineers were so taken with the model that they decided to create a concept vehicle The Hover Ride is a concept and it is unclear if BMW plans to create a commercially available version
